title: New cellulose-based material gives three sensors in one

title_detail.value: New cellulose-based material gives three sensors in one

summary: Cellulose soaked in a carefully designed polymer mixture acts as a sensor to measure pressure, temperature and humidity -- at the same time. The measurements are completely independent of each other. The sensor may be highly significant in fields such as robotics, healthcare and security.

The measurements are completely independent of each other. The sensor may be highly significant in fields such as robotics, healthcare and security.
